choices: Among sugary smelling boulders (A cereal Box)
A vast alien forest (A back yard)
A cheesy smelling chamber (A sneaker or shoe)
1.content:
William, or Will as his friends called him looked out his bedroom window . Something had woken him up. A strange sound and a flash like lightning. What time was it anyway? He picked up his digital clock.

2:00AM. He looked back out his window. It wasn't raining out, in fact there wasn't a cloud in the sky as far as he could tell, so it wasn't thunder that had woke him up. He didn't see any planes flying overhead which would explain the rumble but not the flash of lighted. Ever since his neighbor Ash had disappeared things had gotten pretty weird around town. Some people speculated the weirdness always seemed to occur every thirty years or so like in that Stephen King Novel. What was it called? He was too tired to think.
He looked out the window and shook his head. If nothing happened within the next ten seconds he was going back to be--

FLASH!!!!!

Suddenly Will was blown outward from his bedroom along with the window a part of the wall. As he tumbled and Spun he managed to grab hold of a branch from the tree growing in front of the house. The action had given him just enough time to see the swirling vortex of energy that was trying to suck him up before there was a loud snap and the tree limb he was holding broke off.

He wasn't entirely sure what happened next. He'd never been sucked into a tornado, but he imagined it must be like what he was experiencing at that moment. He tumbled head over heels through flashes of greens and blues for what seemed like forever. The next think he knew he was:
1.title: The Story Begins

11.content:
Ouch.

That was Will's first thought the moment he awoke. That had been one....Whatever the heck it was. The second thought was, where the hell was he? The hard boulder he was laying on should've given him a clue, but the truth was where ever he was it was so dark that he couldn't see anything. The place did smell....like Lucky Charms or Fruit Loops. It took him a moment to realize that what he was laying on wasn't rock. He broke a piece off and taste tested. It was a large chunk of dried---

Suddenly the entire structure he was in was suddenly lifted upward, and then it was moving. If he’d been a fan of the Twilight Zone it probably would’ve clicked in what was going on. Instead he was in a complete shock when the roof of the structure was torn open with a loud cardboard sound and light streamed in.

Blinking Will looked skyward for a moment, not seeing anything. Then he felt everything being lifted and then everything tipped, the contents of the structure, along with Will tumbling like an avalanche out the opened roof.

Right into the largest bowl he’d ever seen in his life.

Coughing up dusty sugar but thankfully unhurt, he looked skyward and if he wasn’t so congested from the sugary powder would’ve scream up at the giant creature above him.

Who was it?
11.title: Free inside

choices: Jump off the spoon and aim for her robe.
112.content:
You look up to see Jane Read, Arthur's mother, wearing a pink fluffy morning robe.

Her hair is all messy and she's kind of half asleep. She probably just woke up. Your first thought is you have to get out of there. Before you can act a waterfall of milk almost drowns you as Jane fills the bowl.

You manage to make it to the surface and start screaming for Jane's attention, your efforts are fruitless. She begins to dip her spoon into the bowl picking up the exact piece of cereal you are using to stay afloat.

"Mmmm I can't wait to try this new cereal. Never saw it at the store before" she says before licking her massive lips.

You are awestruck by how strong her tongue looks. Jane begins to move the spoon closer to her mouth, you have to think of something quick...
112.title: Big Momma

choices: Screw it, you only live once! (Go for the boobs)
1121.content: You decide to take the risk and jump for it, just before the spoon enters her mouth. You land on the trimming of her robe just above her chest. "That was too close" you think to yourself debating where to go next. You look down and see her cleavage poking out from under to robe, considering how warm it would be that probably would not be your best bet. You shift your position and look to the ground seeing Jane is wearing green slippers. You have two choices...
1121.title: Fluffy Salvation

11212.content: You slowly make your way down to the bottom of her robe before jumping and landing on her green fuzzy slippers. Makeing your way onto the floor you can't help but catch a whiff of Jane's footstench. It smells horrible but you kinda like it simply because its so strong. Looking at her ankle and heel you wonder what it would be like to crawl in alongside the massive foot and toes.
11212.title: Land of Giants

choices: She doesn't notice You (Puts the Slipper back on)
112121.content:
You make your way into the slipper, trying your best not to touch her foot immediately. Making your way to the front you are in love with the warm fumes coming off her foot.

"Even if she does catch me she should take it as a compliment, having a man at her feet worshiping her."

You start to feel her big toe, its a little moist and warm. The urge to get intimate overtakes you, shuffling your self under her big toe you drift off into heaven. The weight of her toe on you is a bit painful but surprisingly does not hurt you too much. The smell emitting off of it is lovely and you could not think of a better person to be under. You begin to kiss her toe and lick the sweat off of it, this makes you extremely horny.

"What is in my shoe?" you hear Jane say as her foot starts to shift. "Oh no, not now I just got in here!" She brings her out out of the slipper and the light hits your eyes. You see her staring at you, what does she say?
112121.title: Dreams Come True

1121211.content:
Jane squints to get a better look and then a look of disgust comes over her.

"EW! There's a bug in my slipper!" She says before throwing her slipper off of her foot, the force takes you with it.

You land in the middle of the room bruised but not broken. Jane slowly stand up, you have to get outta there fast. You run as Jane lifts her foot to crush you. It lads with a large BOOM and shakes the ground just inches behind you.

"Oh no you don't little bug. Get back here so I can crush you!" She lifts her other foot to as a follow up attack.

"I'm not a BUG!" you scream, but she didn't hear you. Her other foot comes down just behind you. "Keep in front of her shadow" you think to yourself "its my best chance."
1121211.title: Exterminate!

choices: Arthur grabs you between his toes.
112121111.content:
Arthur walks into the kitchen blurry eyed and barefoot wearing his light blue pajamas. "Mom, what are you doing? Why are you stomping on the floor so much?"

"I'm trying to kill a bug I found in my slipper, wanna help?"

"Sure why not" You look up at the massive boy who just joined he fray.

"Shiiiiiiit" is all that goes through your head.

Arthur lifts his foot, "Die little bug!" At least 5 minutes go by of you trying your best to out run this family of giants trying to kill you. You begin to tire and take a wrong turn. What happens?
112121111.title: The son awakens

1121211112.content:
Somehow they backed you into a corner and now they are standing over you with malicious looks of intent.

"You wanna take turns?" Jane asked.

"Sure" Arthur replied lifting his foot.

"This is where I die" you think to yourself.

One by one they take turns stomping you with their bare feet. First Arthur's feet which reeked of sweat then Jane's larger more powerful feet which were still warm from her slippers. It hurt like hell with each footfall but you didn't seem to take any damage.

"Why won't you die?" Jane said annoyed, "This bug is pretty tough".

"Try grinding it" Arthur suggested.

Jane put her foot on you and applied as much pressure as she swiveled her foot from side to side.

"How do you like this?" she taunted obviously having fun. The immense pressure and foot stink was getting to you, you felt as though you were going to pass out when....
1121211112.title: Surrounded

11212111122.content: You watch as Arthur bends down and pick you up with his ginormous hand. "I think I'm going to keep it, he could be useful for a science project coming up", Arthur suggests. "Fine fine just get it away from me", his Mom complains as she turns around to go back to the table. "Hurry up and put it somewhere you still have to eat breakfast". Arthur runs upstairs to his room clutching you in his fist. He opens the door to his room and starts to think, "Now where should I put you?"
11212111122.title: Arthur has an idea

112121111221.content: Arthur sets you in his shirt pocket as he opens his closet and digs out a shoe box. "This should do nicely until I get home", he says placing you in the left shoe sitting inside the box. It was his formal shoes so they were lightly used but still reeked of feet, HIS specifically. "I hope you don't mind the smell too much, my feet do get really sweaty." He closes the lid to the box and sets you back in his closet shutting the door. You are left in the dark with nothing but sock lint and the stench of feet. How long before you are free?
112121111221.title: Shoe Box

1121212.content: Will what have we here. She said looking at you with a lust in her eyes. It seems I have someone to be my little..........
1121212.title: She notices you...

choices: Play it safe and wait before you can have your real fun when she goes to bed.
Or risk it and start humping her toe and cum on them(Will or will not investiga)
1121213.content:
Jane looks inside the slipper and sees nothing was inside. Glad that no bug crawled inside her slipper and thinking that what she Felt was loose fabric in her slipper. She lowered the slipper to the floor and slide her foot back inside the slipper. Once the slipper was on she can feel the loose fabric under her big toe again choosing to ignore it. She continue to eat her breakfast unaware of the tiny man having the time of his life.

You can see her staring at you and worried that she spotted you and worried that she thinks you're a bug and Not knowing you're a tiny person. You watched and waited to see if she would crush you or help you butbut to your surprise she does not see you and proceeds to lower youand the slipper to the floor and proceeds to put on her slipper happy to see her beautiful brown foot entered the slipperagain and you could continue your fun with her toes.you lay down and waited as you could see her foot slowly and enter her slipper andover your body you continue to kiss and like her toe and your hard-on comes back extremely horny you want to hump her toe and cum on them but worried that she might take her foot out and find you this time what will you do?
1121213.title: She doesn't notice You (Puts the Slipper ba...

112122.content: You hear someone coming. Who is it?
112122.title: You hear someone coming...

choices: Back in the bowl. (Ready for round 2?)
1122.content:
As Jane moves the spoon closer she begins to open her mouth.

You are hypnotized by how huge her mouth is. She could crush you with a single tooth before sending you down her massive throat.

Her tongue twitches eagerly for the taste of the cereal (and you). She pauses for a split second before a yawn sweeps lets out.

Her disgusting morning breath hits you with hurricane force winds and blows you off the spoon along with a few drops of milk. Where do you land?
1122.title: You are blown away

choices: Will is still in the bowl
Will is trapped in her mouth!
11221.content:
*Splash!*

Will dove deep under the murky ocean of milk. He kicked and swam hard back to what he hoped was the surface. He broke above milk and he gasped thankful gulps of air. A huge way shoved him to the side and threatened to take him under. The next time he surfaced he was up inside the center of a cereal bit. Wiping the milk from his eyes he realized the wave had been caused by Jane scooping up another spoonful of cereal.

Jane crunched on the spoonful of cereal, enjoying the new flavor. Had she not been half asleep she might've noticed that there was something out of the ordinary about what she was eating. She might've noticed the tiny creature hanging for dear life to a bit of cereal. But she hadn't.

Then the Phone rang.

"I'll get it."

Rather than leaving her meal at the table , she picked up the bowl and carried it with her as she answered the phone.

" Hello? Oh, hi, Leah."

Jane stirred her cereal causing a Whirlpool effect. Will hung on for dear life and cried out "PLEASE STOP!!"

But between Jane's attention on her conversation and the sound from the radio, his cry fell on deaf ears.

"No, no, I've been up for a while. "

Jane scooped up a spoonful of cereal and held it too her mouth as she listened to the conversation on the other end of the line.

"Really? I'm surprised her mother let her do that."

A moment later the spoonful was in her mouth. She chewed slowly as she listened intently. She glanced at the clock on the wall and swallowed.

"Oh My. I didn't realize how late it was. Talk to you later, Leah." She hung up the phone.

Had she just eaten Will, or was he still in the bowl?
11221.title: Back in the bowl

12.content: Will slammed down hard on a blue plastic chair. Above him, massive students filed into class. Whose chair was he in?
12.title: An enormous Classroom

13.content: These are short chapters but I have no choice.
13.title: Who's Bedroom?

135.content:
You wake up to find everything around you is a lot bigger than it should be. A bed the height of a building, doors the size of a whole city block; why was everything so big? You recognize the enormous bedroom. It was rarely shown in the show but you realize you are in the bedroom of Arthur's parents. You felt almost awestruck as you got the chance to see a place only ever talked about.

The door begins to open, you have to hide but where?
135.title: Arthur's Parent's Bedroom

choices: William once again try to take his first step and wander around this odd world
A terrifying earthquake (which were footsteps) shook William around
The giant bird came back and landed next to William
William decided to climb up one of the flowers for a better look of this world
William heard voices around this place, meaning that he isn't alone
14.content:
William woke up and sat up after a long state of unconsciousness. All he could remember was that he was in his room until a giant tornado appeared out of nowhere and had sucked him inside it. Now looking around, he discovered that he was in what looks like a strange jungle. "I think I might be dreaming right now..." he said as he look upwards to see the most biggest and tallest flowers he ever seen before. As he was about to take his first step, he immediately fell down when he saw something flew by from above. It was so quick that he didn't even notice it but he could have soon it looked like a giant bird of some sort.

"This place is trying to freak me out!" William said shivering.
14.title: A vast alien forest (A back yard)

choices: Westboro Apartments (Home of Francine.  Front of the building)
The Datillos' House (Home of Marina Datillo)
144.content:
Will gazed up at the flower. It had lots of thorns. At least he thought they were thorns, they looked like thorns. Either way, he was going up. It was tall enough to see over the jungle of grass without having to climb up into the flower itself. Good thing too, he didn't know if the plant was carnivorous or when a bee might fly by. Here, a bee would be the size of a midsize car.

One thing he found out right away, as he climbed, that the process of climbing a oversize plant straight up wasn't as easy as it was often portrayed in those movies he watched. His legs and arms were burning by the time he got high enough to see over the lawn.

"Holy crap..."

If Will had thought the world was big before, it had gotten a whole lot bigger.

Scaled up to who knew what scale was a building. A building that was meant to house giants. He was either still dreaming (Doubtful from the feeling in his arms and legs) or he'd found a one way ticket into the Twilight Zone. The more he looked at the immense building, Will couldn't help but think it looked familiar. He studied it more closely, where had he seen it before. Then his eyes went wide as something in his head clicked. He knew the building. More importantly, he knew who lived there.

"No freak'n way...." he gasped.
144.title: Nick Szalinski could do it...

choices: ...a young girl (DW going to eat some cookies from the box)
...a woman with a broom (Jane going to sweep the kitchen floor)
...a group of kids (Arthur and his friends going to eat something)
1441.content:
The house was yellow in color with a blue roof that was built in a gable style. Will couldn't help but saw this house somewhere in a show he watched before but couldn't put his finger on it, what was it? He also remember the people who lived in a home like that but all he could remember was a family of five. "I don't seem to remember the names of those family but from what I know...they don't seemed to be completely human." he said to himself.

He take another at the house and wondered if it's a good idea to go into that home for safety. He doesn't want to end up getting stepped on or even eaten that's for sure. Suddenly, he heard a rumbling sound coming from his stomach. He must be hungry by now but unfortunately, there's no food around this back yard however. At the house, he saw two back doors that leads to the inside. In his mind, he remembered that one of these doors leads to the kitchen. After a few minutes of trying to remember, he finally realized that it was the door on the left. "I know it's a long road ahead but I'm not going to stand here and wait." He said as he slowly gets down from the tall flower and into the ground. Looking ahead, he made his way across the vast jungles of grass.

It's been about an hour and a half, but Will managed to see a clearing along the way. Afterwords, he finally found himself in a pathway that leads to the door. "There it is!" he said as he saw the door that was still far ahead. Will just hope he's correct on this as he made another dash towards it. After a good 30 minutes or so, he finally managed to get in front of the enormous door. "So...this is how big the giants in this world are..." Will said as looked above to see how huge the door was to his puny bug-sized form. He quickly shook his head and focus on the his destination.

Will slowly approached the small space (which was big enough to for a tiny creature like him to crawl under) and take a small peak. Fortunately he was right, it did in fact lead to the kitchen as he could see a dining table, a refrigerator, a sink and pretty much anything else what he normally find in a typical kitchen. Will quickly crawl underneath the door and into the massive house of the giants. So far, no giants are in this room yet so he must look for some pieces of food to eat.

Will surveyed across the floor and spotted the dining table. "I wondered if anyone in this family ever left something for me to eat." he said as he rushed towards under the table and saw a few crumbs all over the spot. Feeling a rumble from his stomach once more, he began to eat the crumbs, one by one.

After eating a few of them, he noticed that these crumbs won't really fill stomach too quickly and decided to leave the table. After he left, he saw something on the shelf that he could try to get food from: a box of cookies. "Now how I'm I going to get up there?" he said. Just as he was about to go towards the shelf, he quickly freezes when he heard a faint sound coming from the next room. It sounded like....footstep! "Oh crap, it must be one of the giant inhabitants!" he said. He wanted to run and hide, but he realized that it was too late because he can hear the door about to open. Will watched as the door soon opened to reveal a...
1441.title: The Read Household

15.content: But who's shoe/sneaker Is It?
15.title: A cheesy smelling chamber (A sneaker or shoe)

info.brief_description: 17 year old Will is about to have the Biggest Adventure of his Life!
info.description:
I've decided to a series of spin offs from my Micro in Cartoons interactive. This one will be about the PBS Cartoon Arthur. In this case Rather than dealing with the previous main Character Ash, this interactive will be about a new character, a 17 year old named Will who has also found himself in a reality where cartoon characters are not only flesh and blood but hundreds of feet tall.

To make it easier for some of you to Add to this Interactive I've decided to Add a choice between having the Characters the same age as they are in the cartoon, or a few years older. For the younger incarnations don't do anything too adult. Keep it Honey I shrunk the Kids level adventure, but for the older incarnations pretty much anything goes.

Will is Tiny in this interactive. Not quite an inch tall.

Themes I'd like to see

Unaware and aware

Mistaken for a bug or toy

Foot/ footplay

Vore / Mouth Play

Exploration. The environment or characters is up to you.

Adventure

Or Anything you can come up with. With the exception of Scat and Water sports (AKA Pee and Crap)

I guess that's about it.
info.pretty_title: Micro In the World Of Arthur
